title: Date.UTC()
description: The `Date.UTC()` static JS method returns the number of milliseconds between a specified date and January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.
content: The static method that returns the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC (the Unix Epoch) for a specified date and time in UTC format. It allows creating a timestamp from individual date and time components.
